org.wso2.identity.asgardeo.tag.service

Interface TagManagementService


  • public interface TagManagementService
    This is the service interface for managing tags.

    • Method Summary

      • addTag

        String addTag(Tag tag)
       throws TagServiceException
        Add tag.
        Parameters:
        tag - Tag details.
        Returns:
        Tag UUID.
        Throws:
        TagServiceException - If an error occurred while adding a tag.

      • getTag

    throws TagServiceException
        Get tag attributes with the given UUID.
        Parameters:
        tagUuid - UUID of the tag.
        Returns:
        Tag.
        Throws:
        TagServiceException - If an error occurred while getting the tag attributes.

      • getTagTypes

        List<Tag> getTagTypes(int limit,
                      int offset)
               throws TagServiceException
        Get a list of tag types.
        Parameters:
        limit - Number of results to be retrieved.
        offset - Offset.
        Returns:
        List.
        Throws:
        TagServiceException - If an error occurred while getting the tag types.

      • filterTags

        TagListResponse filterTags(int limit,
                           int offset,
                           String filter)
                    throws TagServiceException
        Get a list of tags with the given type.
        Parameters:
        limit - Number of results to be retrieved.
        offset - Offset.
        filter - Tag type and name of the tag.
        Returns:
        List.
        Throws:
        TagServiceException - If an error occurred while getting the tags.

      • updateTag

        void updateTag(String tagUuid,
               String name,
               String description,
               boolean isPubliclyVisible)
        throws TagServiceException
        Update tag.
        Parameters:
        tagUuid - UUID of tag.
        name - Name of the tag Tag.
        description - Description of the tag Tag.
        isPubliclyVisible - Public visibility of the tag Tag.
        Throws:
        TagServiceException - If an error occurred while updating the tag.
